title: User wants to edit the day's requests
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a club or BOC user is attempting to submit a Waiver Request
AND current time is before 2 pm on the desired Request Entry Date
custom_steps: WHEN user navigates to the Waiver Request screen in view mode
custom_expected:
THEN "Edit" button should be visible (not visible after 2PM)
AND Clicking "Edit" should open one Request Entry Form

title: User wants to submit a Waiver Request
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user has navigated to the "Waivers" screen from the left nav
AND page is open in edit mode
AND "Submit to BOC" button is available
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Save" or "Submit to BOC"
custom_expected:
THEN system should run a required field and format check according to the data discovery
AND if any fields are missing or formatted incorrectly, user should receive an error message
AND system should refresh the page and sort the players alphabetically
AND system should check for any On Submit rules violations 
AND system should show successful waiver request submission notification and "Submitted On" and "Submitted By" fields are populated
AND these fields should be  updated if request submitted subsequent times
AND system should go back to view mode when complete

title: User wants to receive error/warning if player has DL status and request date is before reinstatement date
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is attempting to submit a Waiver request 
AND the player has a current or pending MJ DL status of:
• 7 Day Concussion DL
• Rehab 7 Day Concussion DL
• 15 Day DL
• Rehab 15 Day DL
• 60 Day DL
• Rehab 60 Day DL
AND request date on the form is before earliest reinstatement date from the player's most recent DL placement or transfer
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks "Submit"
custom_expected:
THEN system should display blocker “Ineligible Waiver Request. [Last Name], [First Name] is on the DL, and has not yet served his minimum period of inactivity. He may have waivers requested on him starting [DL Reinstatement Date].”
AND clicking "Back" should return the user to the form
AND clicking "Ignore and Continue" should ignore the error and continue with the transaction (BOC only)

title: User wants to receive error/warning if player has DL status and request date is before reinstatement date - Optioned Player
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is attempting to submit a Waiver request for an optioned player
AND the player has a MN League DL Status of:
• 7 Day DL
• Rehab 7 Day DL
• 60 Day DL
• Rehab 60 Day DL
AND request date on the form is before earliest reinstatement date from the player's most recent DL placement or transfer
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks "Submit"
custom_expected:
THEN system should display blocker “Ineligible Waiver Request. [Last Name], [First Name] is on the DL, and has not yet served his minimum period of inactivity. He may have waivers requested on him starting [DL Reinstatement Date].”
AND clicking "Back" should return the user to the form
AND clicking "Ignore and Continue" should ignore the error and continue with the transaction (BOC only)

title: User wants to receive error if injury checkbox is checked and one of three Injury Status buttons are not selected
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is attempting to submit a Waiver Request for a player
AND Injury checkbox on the form is checked
BUT one of the three Injury Status buttons are not selected
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Submit"
custom_expected:
THEN system should generate a blocker message (error message #32)
AND BOC should be able to override the blocker

title: User wants to see Release Information appended to Comments when they submit UR Waiver Request
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a club or BOC user is attempting to submit a Waiver Request for a player
AND the request is a UR Waiver Request
AND "Wishes to play in a foreign league" checkbox is not checked
custom_steps: WHEN user submits Waiver Request
custom_expected: THEN The text “As Per Release on [release date] at [release hour]:[release minute][AM/PM][timezone]” should be appended to the Comments

title: User wants to see Release Information appended to Comments when they submit UR Waiver Request - Foreign League
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a club or BOC user is attempting to submit a Waiver Request for a player
AND the request is a UR Waiver Request
AND "Wishes to play in a foreign league" checkbox is checked
custom_steps: WHEN user submits Waiver Request
custom_expected:
THEN The text “As Per Release on [release date] at [release hour]:[release minute][AM/PM][timezone]” should be appended to the Comments
AND the text “Player wishes to play in [country].” should be appended to the Comments
AND the foreign league text should be appended after the  As Per release text

title: User wants to receive error when submitting Waiver Request for a 10/5 player
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user wants to Submit a Waiver Request for a player
AND selected player is a 10/5 player  (Player Profile field "10/5 Player" is Yes) 
AND user has selected an Irrevocable, non-UR waiver type
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks Submit on the Waiver Request
custom_expected:
THEN system should generate blocker message “Ineligible Waiver Request. [Last Name], [First Name] is a 10/5 player, and may not have Irrevocable waivers requested for him.”
AND clicking "Back" should close the modal and return user to the tx
AND clicking "Ignore and Continue" should ignore the error and continue with the tx (BOC only)

title: User wants to receive error when submitting Waiver Request for a player who will become a 10/5 player before expiration date
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user wants to Submit a Waiver Request for a player
AND selected player is is becoming a 10/5 player before the bulletin's claim expiration date (Date to Become 10/5/ player is <= waiver request bulletin date plus two "waiver business" days)
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks Submit on the Waiver Request
custom_expected:
THEN system should generate blocker message “Ineligible Waiver Request. [Last Name], [First Name] is a 10/5 player, and may not have Irrevocable waivers requested for him.”
AND clicking "Back" should close the modal and return user to the tx
AND clicking "Ignore and Continue" should ignore the error and continue with the tx (BOC only)

title: User wants to receive error if Trade waivers are submitted outside of Trade Waiver Request Period
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is attempting to submit a Waiver Request for a player 
AND user has selected Trade Waivers
AND the date falls outside of Trade Waiver Request Period as specified in the System Dates widget
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks Submit
custom_expected:
THEN system should display blocker message “Invalid Waiver Request for [Last Name], [First Name]. Trade Waivers may only be requested between [Trade Waiver Request Period Start Date] and [Trade Waiver Request Period End Date].”
AND clicking "Back" should close the modal and return user to the request
AND clicking "Ignore and Continue" should ignore the error and continue with the request (BOC only)

title: User wants to receive error if Trade or Optional waivers are submitted and the date falls in the Closed Period
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is attempting to submit a Waiver Request for a player 
AND user has selected Trade or Optional waivers
AND the date falls in the Closed Period as specified in the System Dates widget
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks Submit
custom_expected:
THEN system should display blocker message “Invalid Waiver Request for [Last Name], [First Name]. Trade or Optional Assignment Waivers cannot be requested between [Closed Period Start Date] and [Closed Period End Date].”
AND clicking "Back" should close the modal and return user to the form
AND clicking "Ignore and Continue" should ignore the error and continue with the request (BOC only)

title: User wants to receive error if player has non-UR type waivers requested during the DE Closed Period
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is attempting to submit a Waiver Request for a player
AND selected player is Rule 5 Draft Selected or Draft Excluded
AND player has non-UR type waivers requested
AND using year from the Player's profile (i.e. Draft Excluded YYYY), current date falls within DE Closed Period specified in the System Dates widget (Note that the date range spans calendar years)
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks Submit
custom_expected:
THEN system should generate blocker message “Ineligible Waiver Request. [Last Name], [First Name] was either selected in the Rule 5 draft or has a Draft Excluded status and waivers may not be requested until [Eligible Date?].”
AND clicking "Back" should close the modal and return user to the form
AND clicking "Ignore and Continue" should ignore the error and continue with the request (BOC only)

title: User wants to receive error if Non-UR waivers are selected and player's pending MJ status is Bereavement List or Voluntary Retired
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is attempting to Submit a Waiver Request for a player
AND user selects Non-UR waivers
AND selected player's pending or actual MJ roster status is Bereavement List or Voluntarily Retired
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks Submit
custom_expected:
THEN system should generate blocker message “Ineligible Waiver Request. [Last Name], [First Name] is on the [Inactive List Type] list and must be reinstated before waivers may be requested.”
AND clicking "Back" should close the modal and return user to the request
AND clicking "Ignore and Continue" should ignore the error and continue with the request (BOC only)

title: User wants to be able to enter additional fields for a player who wishes to play in foreign league when UR waivers is selected
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a club or BOC user is attempting to submit a Waiver Request for a player
AND UR waiver type is selected for player in a New Request Entry Form
custom_steps: WHEN UR waiver type is selected for player in a New Request Entry Form
custom_expected:
THEN "As per release on" field should be displayed with a date picker and time picker
AND "Wishes to play in a foreign league" checkbox should display
AND when “Wishes to play in a foreign league” is checked, a dropdown should appear with a list of available countries that include Japan, Mexico and South Korea
AND a “Cash Consideration Amount” field should be displayed that allows entry of a dollar amount

title: User wants to see "Player is on Optional Assignment" appended to Comments when Optioned player is selected
custom_preconds: GIVEN a club or BOC user is attempting to submit a Waiver Request for a player
custom_steps: WHEN user selects a player whose current MJ roster status is Optioned
custom_expected: THEN "Player is on Optional Assignment" should be appended to the Comments

title: User wants to see any transaction on the player within the prior 30 days
custom_preconds: GIVEN a club or BOC user is attempting to submit a Waiver Request for a player
custom_steps: WHEN user selects a player that has a tx in his history during the last 30 days
custom_expected:
THEN tx and date should be displayed
AND only latest tx and only latest non-paperwork tx should be shown
BUT if no tx is found the label and field should not display

title: User wants to be shown that they have selected Irrevocable waivers on a player
custom_preconds: GIVEN a club or BOC user is attempting to submit a Waiver Request for a player
custom_steps: WHEN user selects an "Irrevocable" waiver (Outright and UR by default)
custom_expected: THEN "IRREVOCABLE" should display next to Type field

title: User wants to be unable to select a player if player already has a pending waiver request for the selected date (cannot select a player twice)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a club or BOC user is attempting to submit a Waiver Request for a player
AND selected player already has a pending request
custom_steps:
WHEN user clicks "Add Player"
AND opens "Player" Dropdown
custom_expected: THEN player should not be listed in the dropdown

title: User wants to designate that player on DL has recovered
custom_preconds: GIVEN a club or BOC user wants to submit a Waiver Request for a player
custom_steps:
WHEN Request Date is during the season
AND the player is on the DL (This includes both Major League DL and Optioned players on the Minor Lg DL. this includes players on rehab as well)
custom_expected: THEN the user should see “Player has recovered from ailment and is capable of playing at his accustomed level.” checkbox

title: User wants to see "Waivers" as a tab on Transactions Dashboard
custom_preconds:
GIVEN "Transactions" exists as an option in the left nav on the home screen
AND "Waivers" appears as a tab on the Transactions dashboard
AND user is logged in with permissions to view Waivers tab
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Waivers"
custom_expected:
THEN 3 accordions shouuld be displayed on the page
AND details should match wireframes and data discovery

title: BOC User wants to view an existing Waiver Request
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in with permissions to view "Waivers" tab
AND "Waivers" is an option on the left nav
custom_steps: WHEN user views the "Waivers" tab
custom_expected:
THEN for each request system should display Player Name, Position, MLS, DL (Y/N), DE/Sel (Y/N), Waiver Type, Latest Transaction and date (if one exists in last 30 days), Comments and, for BOC, Request Date, Org and Submitted On date, and Submitted By (username)
AND the layout of the tx should match View mode of provided wireframe
AND fields should match data discovery

title: User wants to select a player to submit a Waiver Request for
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in and viewing the "Waivers" tab
AND select2 dropdown to select a player is available
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks select2 player dropdown
custom_expected:
THEN user should be able to choose from a list of players from the selected club, who are eligible to have waivers requested
AND eligible players should only include 40-man roster players and any 60 Day DL/60 Day DL Rehab players

title: Club User wants to view an existing Waiver Request
custom_preconds: GIVEN a club or BOC user is attempting to view an existing Waiver Request
custom_steps: WHEN club user navigates to Waiver Request screen
custom_expected:
THEN "Request Date" should be defaulted to today's date if before 2:00PM
BUT "Request Date" should be defaulted to next Waiver Request Date (next business day) if after 2:00PM
AND if tx is occuring during the Weekend Waiver period as specified in System Dates widget, weekends should be included as business days
AND any requests for the default date and the user's Org should be shown
AND system should display Player Name, Position, MLS, DL (Y/N), DE/Sel (Y/N), Waiver Type, Latest Transaction and date (if one exists in last 30 days), Comments and, for BOC,  Request Date, Org and Submitted On date, and Submitted By (username)
AND layout and fields should match wireframe and data discovery

title: User wants to select a date for a Waiver Request
custom_preconds: GIVEN a club or BOC user is attempting to submit a Waiver Request for a player
custom_steps: WHEN user navigates to date picker field on Waiver Request screen
custom_expected:
THEN date picker should default to today's date until 2:00 PM
BUT after 2:00 PM date picker should default to tomorrow's date
AND system should load appropriate requests for the default date shown and user's Org for club user and selected Org for BOC user
AND system should allow any historical date entry
BUT system should  prevent user from selecting date beyond the default date
AND if different date is selected appropriate requests for that date and Org should be loaded

title: User wants to add multiple players to Waiver Request Form
custom_preconds: GIVEN a club or BOC user is attempting to submit a Waiver Request for a player
custom_steps:
WHEN user navigates to the Waiver Request screen
AND the screen is in edit mode
custom_expected:
THEN user should be able to click "Add Player" to request waivers on additional players
AND user should be able to request waivers on up to a maximum of 7 players
AND after 7 requests have been made the button should no longer be available

title: User wants to see an "Injured" checkbox if Waiver Request is made in the off season
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a club or BOC user is attempting to submit a Waiver Request for a player
AND request date is not between the MJ league "First Day of Season" and "Last Day of Season" system dates
custom_steps: WHEN user selects a player
custom_expected: THEN an "Injured" checkbox should be displayed

title: BOC User wants to edit comments in Waiver Request Form
custom_preconds: GIVEN a BOC user wants to submit a Waiver Request for a player
custom_steps: WHEN BOC user navigates to Waiver Request screen
custom_expected:
THEN BOC user should always see Comments field
AND BOC user should be able to enter/edit comments in the Comments field

title: Club User wants to edit comments in Waiver Request Form
custom_preconds: GIVEN a club user wants to submit a Waiver Request for a player
custom_steps: WHEN club user navigates to Waiver Request screen
custom_expected:
THEN club user should only see comments field if populated 
AND user should not be able to edit comments

title: User wants to see 3 Injury Status radio button choices when they check the "Injured" checkbox in the off season
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is attempting to submit a Waiver Request for a player
custom_steps: WHEN user checks "Injured" checkbox
custom_expected:
THEN user should be able to choose one of three injury status radio buttons listed:
     "Player may be unable to play but his contract may be assigned consistent with the Basic Agreement"
     "Player is unable to play but his contract may be assigned consistent with the Basic Agreement"
     "Player has recovered from ailment and is capable of playing at his accustomed level"
AND none of the three injury status radio buttons should be selected by default, the user should be forced to make a selection
AND "Type of Surgery" text box should be displayed

title: User wants to be shown that they have selected Irrevocable waivers on a player
custom_preconds: GIVEN a club or BOC user is attempting to submit Waiver Requests
custom_steps: WHEN user selects a waiver that is irrevocable (Outright and UR by default)
custom_expected: THEN "IRREVOCABLE" should display next to Type field

title: User wants to remove a Waiver Request before the submission deadline
custom_preconds: GIVEN a club or BOC user is attempting to submit a Waiver Request for a player
custom_steps: WHEN the user navigates to the Waiver Request screen in edit mode
custom_expected:
THEN a trash can should be available for each individual player except for UR waivers that have already been submitted 
AND clicking this trash can should remove the individual request entry
AND user should be able to delete non-UR requests even after submission if still before submission deadline

title: User wants to see comments and waiver price upon selecting player if player is R5 Draft Excluded or Selected - Draft Excluded
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a club or BOC user is attempting to submit a Waiver Request
AND selected Player's Player Profile field "DE/SEL:" is set to DE (Draft Excluded - set if player is Selected to Major League roster after 8/15 in prior year)
AND selected Player's Player Profile "DE/SEL Year" field is the current year
custom_steps: WHEN user selects the player
custom_expected: THEN "Rule 5 Draft Excluded offered at $25,000" should be appended to the comment

title: User wants to see comments and waiver price upon selecting player if player is R5 Draft Excluded or Selected - Selected
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a club or BOC user is attempting to submit a Waiver Request
AND selected Player's Player Profile field  "DE/Sel:" is set to SEL (Selected in most recent Rule 5 Draft)
AND selected Player's Player Profile "DE/SEL Year" field is the current year
custom_steps: WHEN user selects the player
custom_expected: THEN "Rule 5 Draft Selection offered at $25,000" should be appended to the comment
